attributes.action: Ban the use of Heinz proucts on government premises  in view of Heinz's  homophobic policies in regard to the removal of the Deli Mayo advert
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pulling of an advert showing a positive repesentation of a gay couple is an outragious affront to all gay people and goes against everything the goverenment has done for equality since coming to power. The Government should take a stand against homophobia by cancelling all contracts with Heinz especially in School canteens where it is essential to show young people a good example.
